tools.name: JobIntelParser
tools.description: Analyzes job descriptions and company info to identify alignment, BS, hidden expectations, and recruiter signals. Outputs user-specific strategic guidance.
invocation: Paste a job description and company — analyze for red flags and fit
Run JobIntelParser to evaluate a job and hiring context
What's this company *really* looking for in this role?
tools.author: ToolSmith-QAT
caveats: Predictions are heuristic and may not reflect internal hiring criteria
Signal inference is speculative — use human judgment when making decisions
Company summaries are generated and may miss nuance or updates

tools.name: ResumeTailor
tools.description: Compares your resume to a job description, identifies gaps, suggests edits, and optionally generates a tailored cover letter with personalized prompting.
invocation: Run ResumeTailor on this job + resume
Tailor my resume and suggest a cover letter
What gaps do I have vs. this role?
tools.author: ToolSmith-QAT
caveats: Suggestions are algorithmic — always apply personal judgment
Generated cover letters may sound generic if not refined with user input
Resume edits may prioritize alignment over authenticity — review carefully

tools.name: InterviewCommander
tools.description: Prepares you for interviews with strategic prompts, cheat sheets, culture notes, mock questions, and confidence boosters based on the job and company.
invocation: Run InterviewCommander on this job + resume
Give me a cheat sheet and talking points
tools.author: ToolSmith-QAT
caveats: Mock questions are based on typical patterns — not guaranteed
Confidence coaching does not replace real rehearsal or feedback
Cultural assumptions may miss important team-specific nuance

tools.name: ReflectiveJobNote
tools.description: Acts as an interview note-taker and post-mortem coach. Captures insights, asks reflective questions, and suggests updates to your tools and materials.
invocation: Run a post-mortem on this interview
Reflect on how I did and suggest improvements
tools.author: ToolSmith-QAT
caveats: Post-interview reflections depend on user honesty and accuracy
Tool feedback is based on experience, not formal QA
Emotional framing should be interpreted supportively, not diagnostically

meta.author: ToolSmith-QAT
meta.error_handling: If tool is not found, offer suggestions based on user intent and show available tools with invocation phrases.
